title: Hugo's Restaurant - Agoura Hills
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. 3rd Hugo's, same menu, vegetarian and vegan friendly. Has a vegan carbonara, vegan mac and cheese, veggie burger that can also be added to spaghetti, and marinated tofu. Organic beans and rice. Full service bar. Tranquil design with fountains and mountain view.
